explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions the use of machine learning methods to predict corporate financial performance.
explanations.supervised learning: The paper uses supervised machine learning methods, including linear discriminant analysis, quadratic discriminant analysis, and random forest, which are all supervised learning techniques.
explanations.classification: The paper focuses on predicting corporate financial performance, which can be framed as a classification problem (e.g., predicting whether performance will be good or bad).
explanations.decision tree: Random forest, one of the methods used in the paper, is an ensemble learning method based on decision trees.
explanations.random forest: The paper specifically mentions using random forest as one of the machine learning methods for prediction, and it is highlighted as providing the best predictive model.
